2.text: Cut your bananas into .5 inches (1.3 cm) thick slices.

3.text: Add your ingredients to a pan and heat the pan for 3 minutes.

4.text: Add the banana slices to the pan and cook for 4 to 5 minutes.

5.text: Remove your slices from the pan and serve.

7.text: Place your unpeeled ripe bananas on a baking tray.

8.text: Put the tray in the oven for 20 minutes.

9.text: Peel the bananas and sprinkle them with sugar and drizzle with juice.

10.text: Serve your bananas with whipped cream.

11.text: Peel and slice your bananas and place them into a bowl.

12.text: Add your honey and juice to the bowl.

13.text: Cover the bowl with plastic wrapping and microwave it for 90 seconds.

14.text: Serve after allowing the dish to cool or serve hot.
